sentence.Network_en: It is difficult to persuade the superpowers to disarm.
sentence.Network_cn: 要说服超级大国裁军是很难的.

sentence.Network_en: Which country will be the first to disarm?
sentence.Network_cn: 哪一国将首先裁减军备?

sentence.Network_en: There has also been a suggestion that the forces in Lebanon should disarm.
sentence.Network_cn: 也有人建议黎巴嫩的武装力量应解除武装。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... discourage 使失去勇气 disarm 解除武装 dispel 驱除，消除.
缴字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 缴销〖 handinforcancellation〗 缴械〖 disarm〗 缴付〖 pay〗.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... disrobe 脱衣 disarm 解除武装，裁军 dishearten 使失去信心.
蓝宝词典 ... dirge n. 挽歌 disarm vi. 解除武装，缓和，消除敌意 disarray n.vt. 杂乱，混乱.

list.abs: 解除状态 disarm state解禁中断 disarmed interrupt分解，拆卸，解组合 disassemble
故障灯 fault light解除预位灯 disarm light不工作灯 INOP light
directional stimuli 定向刺激，定向促进disarmed strain 可转化态菌株disbud 除芽
Would they really be willing or able to disarm Hizbullah by force ?, 他们是否愿意或是有能力通过武力解除真主党武装?

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French desarmer

entry.def: To disarm a person or group means to take away all their weapons.

example.ex: We will agree to disarming troops and leaving their weapons at military positions.
example.tran: 我们将同意解除军队的武装并把武器留在军事阵地。

entry.tran: 裁军;解除武装;裁减军备(尤指核武器)
entry.def: If a country or group disarms, it gives up the use of weapons, especially nuclear weapons.

example.ex: There has also been a suggestion that the forces in Lebanon should disarm...
example.tran: 也有人建议黎巴嫩的武装力量应解除武装。

example.ex: We're not ready to disarm ourselves in order to make it easier for them to kill us.
example.tran: 我们可不准备放下武器，好让他们更轻易地干掉我们。

entry.tran: 消除(某人)的怒气(或不满、批评等)
entry.def: If a person or their behaviour disarms you, they cause you to feel less angry, hostile, or critical towards them.

example.tran: 他的挂念化解了她的怒气。

example.ex: She did her best to disarm her critics.
example.tran: 她竭尽所能让批评她的那些人消气。

sentences.sentence: "Her charm disarmed the prosecution lawyer completely"

means.word_mean: 3. take away the weapons from; render harmless

auth_sentence.content: He is working to pre-emptively disarm the United States.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is working to pre-emptively disarm the United States.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is working to pre-emptively disarm the United States.

auth_sentence.content: Oddly enough, though, they failed to disarm us.
auth_sentence.res_content: Oddly enough, though, they failed to disarm us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Oddly enough, though, they failed to disarm us.

auth_sentence.content: But no incumbent wants to be the first to disarm.
auth_sentence.res_content: But no incumbent wants to be the first to disarm.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But no incumbent wants to be the first to disarm.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使人惊动的, 令人担忧的
stems_affixes.word_buile: alarm惊慌,警告+ing令人……的→adj.使人惊动的, 令人担忧的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有扶手的, 武装的, [动物]有防卫器官的
stems_affixes.word_buile: arm武器,臂+ed……的→武装的
al加强+arm武器,臂→加强武器→警告

stems_affixes.value_cn: 臂, 臂状物, 衣袖, 海湾, 武器
stems_affixes.word_buile: arm武器,臂→武装,臂
arm武器,臂+ada=ade集体,表示群体→n.舰队;大批
arma=arm武器,臂+ment物→武器,兵器总称
armi=arm武器,臂+stice=stand→武器停止→休战
arm武器,臂+or器→n.装甲

stems_affixes.value_cn: 陆军, 军队, 大群, 大军
stems_affixes.word_buile: arm武器,臂+y表名词→n.陆军, 军队, 大群, 大军
har=arm臂+bour隐蔽处→庇护
al加强+arm武器,臂→加强武器→警告

stems_affixes.value_cn: 供给, 提供, 武装, 装备
stems_affixes.word_buile: arm武器,臂→武装,臂
dis去掉+arm武装→去掉武装
har=arm臂+bour隐蔽处→庇护

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除

Sentence.sentence: Private markets for goods, services, labor, and securities do mostly self-correct, but panic feeds on itself and disarms these stabilizing tendencies.

sentences.en: It is difficult to persuade the superpowers to disarm.
sentences.cn: 要说服超级大国裁军是很难的。

sentences.en: Her words disarmed him at once.
